typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EQP_SCHED_ID as integer,
		AC_RGSTRN as string,
		STS_CD as string,
		STS_NAME as string,
		STS_DESC as string,
		STRT_TIME as string,
		END_TIME as string,
		NOTE as string,
		IS_DELD as boolean,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StgEquipSchd
source(output(
		EQP_SCHED_ID as integer,
		AC_RGSTRN as string,
		STS_CD as string,
		STS_NAME as string,
		STS_DESC as string,
		STRT_TIME as string,
		END_TIME as string,
		NOTE as string,
		IS_DELD as boolean,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StgEquipDup
StgEquipSchd, StgEquipDup exists(StgEquipSchd@AC_RGSTRN == StgEquipDup@AC_RGSTRN
	&& StgEquipSchd@STS_CD == StgEquipDup@STS_CD
	&& ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckForDuplicates
